sentence.Network_en: "All the best," called the other typists in chorus.
sentence.Network_cn: “祝万事如意，”其他打字员齐声喊道。

sentence.Network_en: Caroline sang two verses and the chorus of her song.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡罗琳唱了她歌曲中的两段和副歌部分。

sentence.Network_en: "I've got an idea," said Edward to a chorus of groans.
sentence.Network_cn: “我想到了一个办法，”爱德华在一片哼哼声中说道。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.(denoting a character speaking the prologue and epilogue in a play and serving to comment on events): from Latin, from Greek khoros

entry.def: A chorus is a part of a song which is repeated after each verse.

example.ex: Caroline sang two verses and the chorus of her song...
example.tran: 卡罗琳唱了她歌曲中的两段和副歌部分。
唱到副歌时，大家都跟着一起唱起来。

entry.def: A chorus is a large group of people who sing together.

example.ex: The chorus was singing 'The Ode to Joy'.

entry.def: A chorus is a piece of music written to be sung by a large group of people.
A chorus is a group of singers or dancers who perform together in a show, in contrast to the soloists.

example.ex: Students played the lesser parts and sang in the chorus.
example.tran: 学生扮演一些次要角色，并且参与合唱。

entry.tran: 齐声，异口同声(表示批评、反对或赞扬)
entry.def: When there is a chorus of criticism, disapproval, or praise, that attitude is expressed by a lot of people at the same time.

example.ex: The government is defending its economic policies against a growing chorus of criticism.
example.tran: 面对日渐高涨的齐声指责，政府不断为其经济政策辩护。

entry.def: When people chorus something, they say it or sing it together.

means.word_mean: 1. any utterance produced simultaneously by a group;
2. a group of people assembled to sing together
3. the part of a song where a soloist is joined by a group of singers
4. a body of dancers or singers who perform together
5. a company of actors who comment (by speaking or singing in unison) on the action in a classical Greek play

sentences.en: Never before have I heard this song sung in chorus.
sentences.cn: 我从来没有听过这首歌的合唱。

means.word_mean: 合唱, 齐声背诵, 异口同声地说

sentences.en: The papers all chorused the praises of the President.
sentences.cn: 各报都异口同声地对总统表示赞扬。

jushi.english: The proposal was greeted with a chorus of approval.
jushi.chinese: 大家对这个建议异口同声地表示赞成。

jushi.english: Never before have I heard this song sung in chorus.
jushi.chinese: 我从来没有听过这首歌的合唱。

jushi.english: The chorus were very good, weren't they?
jushi.chinese: 这个合唱团演唱得不错,不是吗?
